extensionDescription.message: 极简的 Keepass 插件，基于 Web Extensions 与 KeepassHTTP
extensionDescription.description: The description for the extension, used in the manifest.

fillUsernamePassDescription.message: 在当前输入框填入用户名与密码
fillUsernamePassDescription.description: The description for the fill username/password hotkey

fillPassDescription.message: 在当前输入框填入密码
fillPassDescription.description: The description for the fill password hotkey

SSsetupCancelled.message: Secure Storage 配置已取消，因此 Keywi 无法正常工作。你可以从设置中重新配置。
SSsetupCancelled.description: Displayed when the setup for the Secure Storage is cancelled.

SSunlockCancelled.message: Secure Storage 解锁已取消，因此 Keywi 无法正常工作。
SSunlockCancelled.description: Displayed when the unlock for the Secure Storage is cancelled.

SSwrongUnlockKey.message: 解锁密钥不匹配，请重试。
SSwrongUnlockKey.description: Alert when the wrong key is given at Secure Storage unlock time

contextFillUserPass.description: Context menu to fill username and password

noPassFieldFound.message: 未找到密码输入框，仅填入用户名。
noPassFieldFound.description: Displayed when no password field was found when filling username and password

otherDBOpen.message: Keywi 已与一个 Keepass database关联，但是已打开的是另一个 database。
otherDBOpen.description: Displayed at initialization if another database than the one keywi is associated with is open

cannotConnect.message: 无法连接到 Keepass database，请确认 Keepass 正在运行并已解锁。
cannotConnect.description: Displayed when keywi cannot connect to the Keepass database

noPassFound.description: Displayed when keywi cannot find any suitable passwords

noLogins.message: 登录到 Keepass database 时出错，请确认已与该 database 关联。
noLogins.description: Displayed when Keepass doesn't give access

assocFailed.description: Displayed when something goes wrong during association

confirmNotPassField.message: 这不是一个密码输入框。确定填入密码?
confirmNotPassField.description: Confirm with the user they want to fill a password in something that is no password field

dialogSetupSSTitle.description: The title for the setup Secure Storage dialog

dialogSetupSSHeader.description: The header for the setup Secure Storage dialog

dialogSetupSSp1.message: Keywi 使用一个密码来安全地存储连接到 Keepass database 所需的信息。
dialogSetupSSp1.description: The first part of the setup Secure Storage dialog body

dialogSetupSSp2.message: 填入一个安全的密码，这不是用于解锁 Keepass database 的密码。
dialogSetupSSp2.description: The second part of the setup Secure Storage dialog body

dialogUnlockSSTitle.description: The title for the unlock Secure Storage dialog

dialogUnlockSSHeader.description: The header for the unlock Secure Storage dialog

dialogUnlockSSp1.message: Keywi 使用一个密码来安全地存储连接到 Keepass database 所需的信息。
dialogUnlockSSp1.description: The first part of the unlock Secure Storage dialog body

dialogUnlockSSp2.message: 现在输入解锁 Secure Storage 的密码。
dialogUnlockSSp2.description: The second part of the unlock Secure Storage dialog body

dialogSelectTitle.description: The title of the select multiple passwords dialog

dialogSelectHeader.description: The header of the select multiple passwords dialog

dialogSelectBody.message: Keepass 为当前URL匹配了多个密码，请选择一个。
dialogSelectBody.description: The body of the select multiple passwords dialog

samePass.description: Placeholder of the repeat password field

dialogConfirmBasicAuthTitle.description: The title of the confirm_basic_auth dialog

dialogConfirmBasicAuthHeader.description: The header of the confirm_basic_auth dialog

dialogConfirmBasicAuthBody.description: The main body text for the confirm_basic_auth dialog

dialogConfirmBasicAuthSelect.description: The main body text for the confirm_basic_auth dialog

dialogConfirmBasicAuthFill.description: The fill option for the confirm_basic_auth dialog

dialogConfirmBasicAuthPage.description: Used in the confirm_basic_auth dialog with page information

dialogConfirmBasicAuthHost.description: Used in the confirm_basic_auth dialog with page information

dialogConfirmBasicAuthRealm.description: Used in the confirm_basic_auth dialog with page information

dialogConfirmBasicAuthHostWarning.message: ~~WARNING: this host is different from the page you're visiting:
dialogConfirmBasicAuthHostWarning.description: Warns the user for differing hosts in the confirm_basic_auth dialog

dialogConfirmBasicAuthSSLWarning.message: ~~WARNING: The connection is not secured, your credentials will be readable for everyone:
dialogConfirmBasicAuthSSLWarning.description: Warns the user for lack of https in the confirm_basic_auth dialog

optTitle.description: The title for the options page

optUserInfoHeader.description: The header for the user info on the options page

optHashRounds.message: 密钥生成时的哈希散列数（高级设置）：
optHashRounds.description: options page: number of hashing rounds

optDeferUnlockSS.message: 启动时不解锁 Secure Storage
optDeferUnlockSS.description: options page: don't unlock the secure storage on startup

optReEncrypt.description: options page: re-encrypt the secure storage

optAssociate.description: options page: text showed on button to associate with Keepass, if not already associated

initSSFailed.message: 初始化 Secure Storage 失败！
initSSFailed.description: Message shown when the secure storage can't be initialized
